Joint Staff Training¶

Dierdorf, Germany, November 20. We held our joint staff training in Dierdorf where the teachers of the Erasmus project came together to discuss the project. After Jan-Micha Kroll, a former student of the MBG who created Sdui, an awesome app make school-student communication easier, to Florian and Thomas held a presentation on the state of the app, where they explained the following:

  • Main parts of the app to focus on
  • How to use the interface
  • How to upload and manage content
  • How to work together collaboratively

and more…

You can find the GitHub page at https://github.com/smartplastic/, it should look similar to this:

There, your students can take a closer look at what we are doing right now.

Here you can download the presentation, explanations and the example files:
Presentation
Databases explained
Example article used
Example article's thumbnail
… or simply download all files together in a single zip-file:
